Oil change is easy. Parts still have since there were 23 million classic beetles made from late 40s to '03. Many aftermarket parts support too.But being old  things breaks here and there. Since some part should be original from factory that degraded due to wear and tear.
sounds like my e30. so unloved i got to do it myself
oil change  water pump change  cam cover cleanup. intake etc. few mechanics wants to do. but i kinda enjoy doing it too
as e30 is a cult car  parts are available worldwide. any are die hards
the ony parts not easily available are the body parts - bumpers  wheel arch  front valence etc
but i get asked frequently at tuas customs. they are all curious how such old cars are still drivable... ğŸ˜ƒ

He didnâ€™t want to refuel abs I asked him why. He said malaysia fuel ainâ€™t clean and contaminated. We all couldnâ€™t stop laughing. Do not let the Malaysians laugh at such behavior that we dare not drive ev to Malaysia. Itâ€™s naive thinking. Please consider taking back that question.
